lead_paragraph: For Tyler Flowers and his fellow catchers, the slightest flex of the hand, the smallest twitch of the arm, can make the difference between a ball and a strike.

headline.print_headline: BASEBALL 2016: Framing Pitches a Subtle, Yet Crucial Skill
headline.main: BASEBALL 2016: Framing Pitches a Subtle, Yet Crucial Skill

snippet: For Tyler Flowers and his fellow catchers, the slightest flex of the hand, the smallest twitch of the arm, can make the difference between a ball and a strike....
